headline: U.S. May Tighten China Export Rules on Cadence (CDNS), Synopsys (SNPS)
summary: On Thursday, Reuters reported that the U.S. Commerce Department has issued notification letters to several Electronic Design Automation (EDA) software companies, including Cadence Design Systems Inc. (NASDAQ:CDNS), Synopsys Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) and Siemens EDA, asking them to halt the supply of their technologies to China. Although no official statement or formal order has been issued, the […]
